Player History

Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1967...
Had first career hit on 7/7/1969, off Scott Balogh (CI)...

Drove in 6 runs against Penn on 8/18/1974...

Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
